entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:05 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Flurries in the morning. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:05 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 over northern sections late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:05 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
